page.title: 04Oakham School
page.content:
Oakham School was built in 1584 by Archdeacon Johnson. Oakham School is famous and in 1984 the Queen came to visit Oakham School to celebrate the four hundreth anniversary of its founding. Oakham School has buildings all over the town. In one part there is the hall, in another there is the sports hall, another the swimming pool and so on around the town. There are about 1000 children at Oakham School. Originally Oakham School only took boys but now girls can go there as well.
(by Jenny Pye)
